1. Launch Throne and Liberty and progress to the Title Screen

2. Either select an existing character if you have one, or create a new character if you do not

3. Complete the tutorial and progress to Kastelton to unlock the Coupon feature

4. Open the Main Menu and select the Coupon button from the right-most pane

5. Enter the coupon code received, then press the "Use" button

6. The Ornate Coins received will automatically be added to your balance once the coupon is claimed


Coupon codes from this Quest can only be used once per account. Coupon codes received are valid until 10/31. Coupon codes can only be claimed after completing the tutorial and reaching Kastelton

To redeem your Celestial Ties Shader, visit Bungie.net/redeem and sign into your account.

You can then enter the code you received and pick up your Celestial Ties Shader in the Tower at the Special Deliveries terminal between the Cryptarch and Gunsmith.

Redemption code expires 12/31/2024 0:00:00 (UTC-8).

redemption_instructions_by_platform.0:
**Claim Your Code Online**

1. Log into your Account Overview: [account.blizzard.com/overview](https://account.blizzard.com/overview)

2. Enter the code in the Redeem a Code box and click Redeem Code

**Claim Your Code on the Battle.net Desktop App**

1. Login to the Battle.net Desktop App

2. Click your profile icon at the top right corner of the App

3. Click Redeem Code

*Note: Reward code must be redeemed on Battle.net but will be accessible on Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, and Steam, as long as the user has a valid Diablo IV license. Ensure that your Battle.net ID is linked to your gaming platform. After redeeming the code on Battle.net, your items will be available the next time you log into your selected platform.*

How To Use Redeem Codes


1. Once you have a Redeem Code, head over to https://bit.ly/SNAPredeem to redeem it!

2. To proceed, you will need to verify your SNAP ID, which can be found in-game at the bottom of your settings page. Simply tap on it to reveal your ID.

3. Once your code is successfully redeemed, the reward will be sent to your in-game inbox!

4. Please note, the Redeem Code is valid from Pacific Time (PT): October 17, 2024, 9:00:00 AM to October 31, 2024, 8:59:59 AM.

To redeem your item, press F3 or ESC in the game to access the event interface (you must complete the tutorial first). Once there, either press X or click the “Redeem Code” button in the bottom right. Enter your code in the pop-up window and hit REDEEM to claim your reward.

redemption_instructions_by_platform.4:
**1. How to redeem in-game:**

**[PC]**
 Start The First Descendant > Press [Esc] > [Options] > [Account] > [Enter] in the Enter Coupon option.
 Enter the coupon code and press [Confirm].
 Press [G] > [Albion] and access the mailbox to receive the item.

**[Consoles]**
 Start The First Descendant > Press [Options] > [Account] > [Enter] in the Enter Coupon option. Enter the coupon code and press [Confirm]. Access the mailbox in Albion to receive the item.

**2. How to redeem on the Coupons page:**

**[PC & Consoles]**
 Enter The First Descendant’s Coupon page https://mcoupon.nexon.com/tfd.
 Enter your member code and coupon number to redeem the item.
 The member code can be copied from the Game Menu > Options > Account > Member Code.

 Rewards will be available until *December 31st at 23:59 (PT)*.

3. Requires Minecraft: Bedrock Edition; redeem by January 20, 2025.

**Join the official Walmart Skyward Discord server.** Collect your one-time use code to claim your exclusive in-game pet.


1. Join the Walmart Skyward Java Experience.  
2. Launch Minecraft Java Edition (version 1.21.3).  
3. Connect to the server using the IP: playskyward.gg. and redeem Your Pet Code.  
4. Once inside the server, locate the Skyward Redemption NPC in the main hub area.  
5. Approach the NPC and right-click to interact.  
6. The Anvil GUI will open as a text prompt.  
7. Enter your one-time use code in the text prompt and confirm.  
8. Upon successful redemption, your exclusive pet will be added to your inventory.
